00039 class SimpleWntCellCycleModel : public AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel
00040 {
00041 private:
00042 
00044     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00051     template<class Archive>
00052     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00053     {
00054         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel>(*this);
00055 
00056         RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00057         archive & *p_gen;
00058 
00059         archive & mUseCellTypeDependentG1Duration;
00060     }
00061 
00066     bool mUseCellTypeDependentG1Duration;
00067 
00068 protected:
00069 
00079     void SetG1Duration();
00080 
00087     SimpleWntCellCycleModel(double g1Duration, bool useCellTypeDependentG1Duration=false);
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00097     SimpleWntCellCycleModel(bool useCellTypeDependentG1Duration=false);
00098 
00102     void UpdateCellCyclePhase();
00103 
00107     void ResetForDivision();
00108 
00112     void InitialiseDaughterCell();
00113 
00118     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateDaughterCellCycleModel();
00119 };
